attributes.action: get Chicken Cottage on Gallowgate in Newcastle to stop spilling akrid fried chicken fumes out the side of their buildng vents poisoning every person who walks pasts and ruining the way their clothes smell, and having them moved them to the roof.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is mainly because it's really annoying having to walk past the filthy place every bloody day!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
